Sunflower Soup: Create a unique and flavorful soup made with sunflower petals and other vegetables, marketed as a healthy and visually appealing meal option.
Sunflower Brew: Develop a line of artisanal beers infused with sunflower petals, offering a distinct taste and aroma that showcases the beauty of nature.

Sunflower Art Gallery: Convert a vacant lot into an outdoor art gallery featuring vibrant and colorful murals and sculptures made entirely of sunflowers, providing a unique and inspiring experience for art enthusiasts.
Sunflower-Powered Vehicles: Design and build electric cars and bicycles that run on sunflower-based biofuels, promoting sustainable transportation and reducing carbon emissions.
Sunflower Therapy: Offer sunflower-based therapy sessions, where patients are surrounded by the calming and uplifting presence of sunflowers, promoting mental well-being and relaxation.
